name: TAG detector
description: This will detect and mute users who havent used your tag on their names on telegram groups

Tag_Check_Group.description: Your Group id where you want to check user's tags(with -100 in front)

Tag_Name.description: The Tag name you want to set for checking

AU_ID.description: Approved Users(who doesnt affect the rule) IDs separated by ',' ex : 123421454,245245624366,3463463,

Bot_url.description: The bot's telegram link. Ex:-https://t.me/your_bot?start=start Note:- Include '?start=start' at the end of the url!
